The capital city is Assosa. The name of the region comes from two local ethnic groups â€“ Berta (also called as Benishangul) and Gumuz. ==Administrative zones== Like other Regions in Ethiopia, Benishangul-Gumuz is divided into administrative zones. *Asosa *Kamashi *Metekel ==References== Category:Regions of Ethiopia
